subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] getting a box
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Hi Bruce;

I'm trying to get to point where I can get this stuff in production, there's 
just so many variable that I haven't quite solved yet.  I have the tuner 
problems solved, and now trying to address the intelligibility problem of 
the voices, that's where you can tell someone is talking, but it's guess as 
to what's being said. Contrary to what was presented on the C2C show, I 
don't have this down to a science yet.  Then making it handipcaped usable, 
that's a whole new set of challenges.

Frank


>From: "bhali333" <paranormalinvestigating@...>

>hi,
